entries.meaning: (computing) One who writes computer programs; a software developer.
One who decides which programs will be shown on a television station, or which songs will be played on a radio station.
A device that installs or controls a software program in some other machine.
examples: This system comprises a boiler with its own thermostat to regulate the water temperature, a pump, a hot-water storage tank, a room thermostat and some form of timed programmer.

entries.meaning: (now rare) A short film feature as part of a longer film program.
examples: As a programmer, the Chan series is linked to the B picture, known for its low production value and overt, disruptive, unpolished, even lurid narratives.
